video_prompt: Meteors streak across the sky, leaving fiery trails. Clouds transition from dark to glowing orange at the horizon. The sun descends, its reflection shimmering on rippling water. Golden light radiates outwards.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** A dramatic vertical shot of a meteor shower over an ocean at sunset/sunrise. Dark, starry sky with orange and white meteor streaks, transitioning to a vibrant orange and gold horizon with glowing clouds. A brilliant sun reflects on rippling water, creating a shimmering path of golden light.
refined_video_prompt: Fiery meteors blaze across the sky, their trails intensifying. Clouds morph from deepening twilight to vibrant, glowing orange at the horizon. The sun descends, its reflection dancing and shimmering across dynamically rippling water. Golden light pulses and expands outwards.
